alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:39AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Pew Creek at Patterson Road near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett County. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Lilburn, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pew Creek at Patterson Road near Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Minor flooding of the natural flood plain begins. The parking lot of the Saratoga Swim and Tennis Club downstream from the river gauge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.1 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM EST Tuesday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EST.
